entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who swayed on the spot and whispered to Harry. She is reacting to something that has happened.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one Hermione whispers to, indicating he is present in the scene.

relationships.description: Hermione speaks to Harry, as indicated by her whispering to him. This is a direct quote from the text: "They did it!" she whispered to Harry.
